articles.title: The Morning After: Google expands access to its AI chatbot, Bard - Engadget
articles.description: The top news stories today: The top news stories today: Google opens up access to AI chatbot Bard, Ford unveils an electric Explorer crossover built for Europe's narrow streets, Duolingo is building a music learning app..
articles.content: Google Bard is the companys answer to ChatGPT: an AI chatbot using LaMDA, the companys in-development language model. Weve been testing it, and whats immediately clear are all the companys warnings, … [+4585 chars]

articles.author: Jenni Reid, Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: European stocks cautiously higher after UK inflation surpasses expectations; Fed rate decision due - CNBC
articles.description: European markets opened flat on Wednesday, after U.K. inflation unexpectedly accelerated.
articles.content:
U.K. annual inflation increased from 10.1% in January to 10.4% in February, official figures showed. Economists in a Refinitiv poll expected a 9.9% increase.
